Monster.Name: Giant Snapping Turtle
Monster.Description: Giant snapping turtles can grow to be 12 feet in diameter. Although they appear slow and ponderous, they are capable of startling bursts of speed and will aggressively attack smaller creatures that approach them. One snap of a giant turtle's jaws can cut a human in half, and these creatures aren't fussy about what they eat.

MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: The turtle can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Stable
MonsterTrait.Text: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle prone, it can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked prone. A prone turtle is upside down. To strand up it must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.
